price: 22. Dheh: Cidina igama celin karto (Ciqaabka) Alle (Haddaan ku caasiyo), mana helayo sokadi wax ciirsi iyo agab ah.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٞ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul innī lan yujīranī mina al-lahi aḥadun walan ajida min dūnihi mul'taḥadan
